meanings.definition: A person who jogs as a form of exercise.
meanings.sent1: The joggers in the park looked determined and focused.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of joggers running along the trail this morning.
meanings.sent3: The joggers raced each other to the finish line, laughing all the way.
meanings.sent4: The joggers moved like a pack of energetic wolves through the forest.
meanings.sent5: The image of the joggers' rhythmic movements stayed with me all day.

meanings.definition: Loose-fitting pants worn for exercise or casual wear.
meanings.sent1: She wore comfortable joggers to the gym for her workout.
meanings.sent2: The joggers he had on were perfect for a relaxing day at home.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally wore his joggers to the fancy dinner party, causing a stir.
meanings.sent4: Her joggers were like clouds hugging her legs as she walked.
meanings.sent5: The soft fabric of the joggers made them a joy to wear all day long.
